item.title: Pentagon: Guantanamo Prisoner Sent to Tunisia
item.description: The U.S. Department of Defense said on Monday that detainee Ridah Bin Saleh Al-Yazidi was repatriated from Guantanamo Bay to Tunisia.

item.title: Ronald Kessler to Newsmax: Secret Service Says Carter Wasn't 'Decent'
item.description: Former Secret Service agents paint a starkly different picture of President Jimmy Carter's character than the one recently praised by President Joe Bi...

item.title: FBI: Organized Crime Targeting Pro Athletes
item.description: The FBI issued a warning to professional sports leagues earlier this month, warning them that the athletes were being targeted by organized crime.
